scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && babel ./lib --out-dir dist/lib --presets es2015 --plugins babel-plugin-add-module-exports && babel ./example --out-dir dist/example --presets es2015 --plugins babel-plugin-add-module-exports
scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist/ && babel ./lib --out-dir dist/lib --presets es2015 --plugins babel-plugin-add-module-exports && babel ./example --out-dir dist/example --presets es2015 --plugins babel-plugin-add-module-exports
